summary: This document is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office to attorney Michael Salnick regarding the interview of his client, Janusz Banasiak. It outlines the terms of the debriefing, clarifying that Banasiak is not a target of the investigation but must provide truthful information. The letter also discusses the implications of false statements and the presence of government attorneys during the debriefing.

persons.name: Janusz Banasiak
persons.context: Banasiak is the client of attorney Michael Salnick and is being interviewed as part of an investigation, although he is not a target.

persons.name: Michael Salnick
persons.context: Salnick is the attorney representing Janusz Banasiak and is involved in the communication with the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the terms of the interview.

persons.name: R. Alexander Acosta
persons.context: Acosta is the U.S. Attorney who authored the letter outlining the terms of the debriefing for Banasiak.

persons.name: A. Marie Villafaña
persons.context: Villafaña is the Assistant U.S. Attorney who is involved in the case and communicates with Salnick regarding Banasiak's situation.

connections.description: Salnick represents Banasiak in legal matters, including the upcoming debriefing.
Banasiak is being interviewed by Acosta's office as a witness in the investigation.
Salnick communicates with Acosta regarding the terms of Banasiak's debriefing and legal representation.
Salnick interacts with Villafaña regarding the legal status and debriefing of Banasiak.

events.title: Debriefing Agreement
events.description: A letter outlining the terms of the debriefing for Janusz Banasiak, clarifying his non-target status and the conditions of his interview.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: Banasiak is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury and provide documents related to his employment and contact information for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Communication Regarding Subpoena
events.description: A letter from Acosta to Salnick confirming that Banasiak is not a target of the grand jury investigation and discussing the possibility of a Kastigar letter.

locations: 500 South Australian Ave., Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
One Clearlake Centre, 250 South Australian Avenue, Suite 1203, West Palm Beach, FL 33401

keyFacts: Janusz Banasiak is not a target of the investigation but is required to provide information regarding criminal activity.
The debriefing agreement protects Banasiak's statements from being used against him, provided he is truthful.
Banasiak has been subpoenaed to testify before the Grand Jury and provide specific documents related to his employment and contact information for Jeffrey Epstein.
The letter clarifies that no additional promises or agreements have been made beyond what is stated in the correspondence.
